Name: Nightmare Of Melanie
About the game: ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- About the Game Ling woke up in the dark room with a gloomy face. She can't remember how she got to this place. Everything around her looks like her own home.But full of grief and sadness. Darkness covered everything, as if hiding something from the Ling. The tragic death of family members Shadows, weird murals on walls, uncomfortable crayons and diaries all seem to warn her that you shouldn't go back.Come on. Ling felt unprecedented sadness, unspeakable pain surged into her heart, but she could not find the problem. ... That's it. Sample. Ling, in grief and sadness, began to look for the outlet of nightmares... -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
